meanings.definition: The quality or state of being ceaseless.
meanings.sent1: The ceaselessness of the rain made it difficult to go outside.
meanings.sent2: The ceaselessness of the waves crashing against the shore was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent3: The ceaselessness of the baby's crying was both exhausting and concerning.
meanings.sent4: The ceaselessness of time's march forward is a reminder of life's fleeting nature.
meanings.sent5: The ceaselessness of the wind howling through the night created an eerie atmosphere.

meanings.definition: The continuous or uninterrupted nature of something.
meanings.sent1: The ceaselessness of the music in the background helped me focus on my work.
meanings.sent2: The ceaselessness of the traffic outside our window was a constant source of noise.
meanings.sent3: The ceaselessness of the dog's barking was both annoying and amusing at the same time.
meanings.sent4: The ceaselessness of the waterfall's flow symbolized the eternal cycle of nature.
meanings.sent5: The ceaselessness of the clock ticking in the room made me acutely aware of the passing seconds.
